title: The Pattern of Britain: crofters
creator_credit: Ralph Keene, Edgar H. Anstey and Verity Films
brief_description: The life of a crofting community in the extreme north-west of Scotland. By communal activity and shared effort, the people of this region make a living by agriculture, grazing and fishing. This film was made with the co-operation of the villagers of Achriesgill, in Southerlandshire, Scotland.
